question: A water tank is cylindrical with a radius of 6 m and height of 15 m. How much water (in cubic meters) can it store?
Find the volume of a truncated cone with radii 5 cm and 8 cm, and height of 12 cm.
A metallic sphere of radius 8 cm is melted and recast into smaller spheres of radius 2 cm. How many smaller spheres can be made?
Find the total surface area of a hollow cylinder with external radius 10 cm, internal radius 8 cm, and height 14 cm.
A frustum of a pyramid has a lower base area of 200 cm² and upper base area of 80 cm². If the height is 25 cm, find its volume.
A spherical tank with a diameter of 20 m is half-filled with liquid. Find the volume of the liquid inside.
Find the surface area of a solid cone with base radius 12 cm and slant height 20 cm.
A hemispherical bowl has a radius of 14 cm. Find its total surface area.
Find the volume of a torus with inner radius 6 cm and outer radius 12 cm.
A cylindrical pipe is 40 cm long and has inner and outer radii of 4 cm and 5 cm. Find its total volume.
A pyramid has a square base of 15 cm sides and a height of 30 cm. Find its volume.
Find the lateral surface area of a frustrum of a cone with base radii of 7 cm and 14 cm, and height of 21 cm.
A composite object consists of a cube (side length 10 cm) and a hemisphere on top. Find its total surface area.
Find the volume of an elliptical cylinder with major axis 8 cm, minor axis 5 cm, and height 10 cm.
A conical tank with radius 6 m and height 12 m is half-filled with liquid. Find the volume of the liquid inside.
